name: Souvlaki Sheet Pan Dinner
description: Simplify your life, sheet pan style! This is all the vibrant, Greek flavours of souvlaki, conveniently packed into a single pan for minimal effort and maximum satisfaction. Dinner in a pan, my friends: it’s the meal solution you’ve been looking for.

ingredients.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning or Donair Seasoning

preparation: Meanwhile, in a bowl, whisk together seasoning, vinegar, and oil.
Drain and rinse chickpeas; place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Add chicken, tomatoes, and green beans. They will overlap—that’s OK. Drizzle sauce on top; gently toss to combine.
Bake 15 min, or until chicken is cooked through, beans are tender-crisp, and some of the tomatoes have burst.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 small pita and 2 tbsp Lemon Dilly Dip.
